name: Internship in Archaeology
desc: Permission of the instructor and the director of undergraduate studies. Internships combine substantive work experience with an academic project.
Repeat: May be repeated for credit. 12 total credits. 2 total completions.

name: Research in Archaeology
desc: Permission of the instructor. For students who wish to participate in laboratory or field research programs. May be taken twice.
Repeat: May be repeated for credit. 12 total credits. 2 total completions.

name: Independent Study in Archaeology
desc: Permission of the instructor. Special reading and research in archaeology under the supervision of a selected instructor. May be taken twice.
Repeat: May be repeated for credit. 12 total credits. 2 total completions.

name: Seniors Honors Thesis, Part 1
desc: Permission of the instructor. Restricted to senior honors candidates. First semester of senior honors thesis. Independent research under the direction of an archaeology curriculum faculty member.

name: Senior Honors Thesis, Part 2
desc: Permission of the instructor. Restricted to senior honors candidates. Second semester of senior honors thesis. Independent research under the direction of an archaeology curriculum faculty member.
